head.p: to: john@gymnasium.herzogenrath.de from: somefriend@Britain.com sub: student exchanges are definitely worth 16th of December 2021

p.s: I have read your last E-maile-mail you have sent to me, about student exchanges I personally couldn't withstand so that I write you back and give you some arguments for an exchange.

So first of all you don't have to take a gap year so if you have already finished school and applied to a university you can try to get a semester abroad there this way you can study while exploring cultures and meeting new people and you don't have ro revise a whole year.
So where is the wasted time.

I personally would try to experience as much cultures as possibly so that when you apply for a job or a university you are way ahead of the others when it comes to intercultural understandings which in my opinion is a key ingredient in our connected world.
So even when you do an exchange year in High School and have to revise the class I wouldn't say that you have wasted your time you just invested it in something different.
By the way I think that such an exchange year is also a fun way to escape your current life and just see it in another perspective.
However I hope I've changed your view on exchange years a bit and that you write me back soon.
